channel.title: Removing/Adding Objects & Npc's plz HELP
channel.description:
Ok i am using the reapagescape v2 source and idk how to remove the staffzone in the wall at cwars, and i also wunnu add object to either block thinigs off or make stuff
And if u could tell me a way i can add npc's that stay after a server restart plz let me know??

item.title: Removing/Adding Objects & Npc's plz HELP
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“n00bf0rlyf3, post:2, topic:266030”]well… if you want to add a npc.
Go to autospawn.cfg

Enter this

spawn = [NPC] [X COORD] [Y COORD]	0	0	0	0	0	[WALKTYPE] [NAME OF NPC]

The 0s do pretty much nothing
They should stay for over a reset. If they go away during a reset, your doing ::npc [npc code]
That only temporarily spawns it.

Hope this helps![/quote]
Look at the date before posting next time.

Read full topic

item.title: Removing/Adding Objects & Npc's plz HELP
item.dc:creator: @n00bf0rlyf3 n00bf0rlyf3
item.description:
@n00bf0rlyf3 wrote:

well… if you want to add a npc.
Go to autospawn.cfg

Enter this

spawn = [NPC] [X COORD] [Y COORD]	0	0	0	0	0	[WALKTYPE] [NAME OF NPC]

The 0s do pretty much nothing
They should stay for over a reset. If they go away during a reset, your doing ::npc [npc code]
That only temporarily spawns it.

Hope this helps!

Read full topic
